channel.title: SQL on ProGramin'g Blog
channel.description: Recent content in SQL on ProGramin'g Blog

item.title: What is SQL now?
item.description: SQL is Esperanto in the data world. But unlike “Lingwe Uniwersala” SQL became world-known and really common. Initially SQL was invented in 70 special for databases. Even then its creators aimed to create a simple and powerful data language for a wide range of users, with not only IT background, such as engineers, scientists, researchers, analytics, managers etc. SQL first of all was made by humans for humans, not for machines.
